pitch.cc: Justin Verlander may prefer to go after Mike Moustakas, whose OPS is .498 this season, with the curveball rather than facing Alcides Escobar, whose OPS is .616.
Justin Verlander is having trouble locating his four-seam fastball, missing the strike zone with his last three.
